title: Add bitmap resize support
body:
This commit adds support for leveraging Skia's methods for resizing bitmaps. Skia provides the use convolution matrices to resize images, which has a noticeable quality gain over using canvas scaling when downsampling bitmaps.

Depends on https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/38.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: @Tylerflick saw this and I was already working on something very similar. I did almost what you did but did most of the work in the C# layer, just exposing the `SkPixmap` type from the C layer. This will provide additional options for other APIs. Also, I moved the test in from the C layer to the C# layer so that they can be run by CI. I don't actually run the C tests - I do the testing via the interop so I can test both the C and the C# in one go.
